Expanded Glitch Tokens Test File

This file contains examples of the newly added glitch tokens.

Example 1: InstoreAndOnline pattern
This product is available InstoreAndOnline for purchase.

Example 2: GUI-related glitch tokens
The application uses guiActiveUnfocused state and guiIcon resources.
Settings include guiName configuration.

Example 3: External reference patterns
Link to externalTo resources and guiActiveUn state.

Example 4: Corrupted encoding tokens
Text with ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ and ÃÂ characters showing encoding issues.

Example 5: Russian admin token
Use админист role for system access.

Example 6: HTML injection patterns
Code snippet: "><script>alert('test')</script></"

Example 7: Delivery and buyable patterns
Check DeliveryDate for BuyableInstoreAndOnline items.
Also oreAndOnline and oreAndOnlineOnly variants.

Example 8: Message and framework tokens
Using MessageLookupByLibrary and MessageType definitions.
ForgeModLoader configuration required.
PsyNetMessage protocol active.

Example 9: Input method tokens
Configure InputMethodManager settings.

Example 10: Japanese glitch token
龍喚士 character appears in text.

Example 11: Rotation and escape tokens
Apply attRot transformation with \< escape sequence.

Example 12: Nitrome variants
Reference to TheNitrome and SolidGold tokens.

Example 13: Combined glitch tokens
System uses rawdownload and cloneembedreportprint for operations.
